text: so Monday is a project management and
team collaboration platform that is
designed to assist teams to be more
transparent and to better collaborate on
projects and tasks so transparency is
our way of giving the employees and
developers and marketing teams and
everyone working at Monday the tools
they need to make smart decisions to
make data based decisions if you hide
information from people you don't give
them enough tools to be successful so we
believe in the exact opposite share as
much as possible give people as much
information as possible
and then let them succeed we think and
we work a lot about scaling and
seamlessly scaling because our company
grows like 3x a year which is super fast
and one of the things that amazon has
helped us do is to avoid having to deal
with infrastructure and deal with
configuration and all the things that
you used to do 20 years ago we launched
instances we use the managed services
like lambda and SQS and SNS and lots of
other managed services to just give AWS
the responsibility for all the
underlying hardware and just focus about
scaling and building a better product so
2018 was our year of scaling in terms of
being a single focal software a software
that allows you to manage projects and
tasks in 2019 we're working about making
Monday a platform meaning that it is a
central hub of information for you and
your team and it allows you to
centralize all the data that you need to
create and consume you can create forms
that you can embed in your own website
you can broadcast boards out of the
system to wherever you want we have a
whole host of new feature that is aimed
making Monday like a one-stop shop for
everything you need to manage your work
